recipe.ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (6 ounces each),1 tablespoon olive oil,2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice,1 garlic clove, minced,1 teaspoon dried oregano,1/4 teaspoon black pepper,4 cups mixed salad greens,1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved,1 small cucumber, sliced,1/4 red onion, thinly sliced,1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled,1/4 cup Kalamata olives, pitted,2 tablespoons red wine vinegar,1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil,1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard
recipe.directions: Preheat grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.,Whisk together 1 tablespoon olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, oregano, and black pepper in a bowl. Add the chicken breasts, coating them well with the marinade. Let them marinate for at least 20 minutes.,Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink in the center. Remove from grill and let rest before slicing.,In a large salad bowl, toss together the mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion. Top with sliced grilled chicken, feta cheese, and Kalamata olives.,To prepare the dressing, whisk together red wine vinegar, extra-virgin olive oil, and Dijon mustard until emulsified. Drizzle dressing over the salad and gently toss to combine.
